title: Senior Solution Architect
text: Working with corporate customers defining, scoping and delivering solutions for their applications and infrastructure observability needs at New Relic - a software analytics platform for monitoring and managing the performance of applications, servers, and other infrastructure components.

title: Senior Software Engineer
text: Development and maintenance of a distributed user notification and alerting system for Zoopla, a leading UK-based real estate company.

title: Senior Software Engineer
text: Leading and delivering key back-end projects for Tesco, a global groceries and general merchandise retailer.

title: Senior Software Engineer
meta: The Times and The Sun Newspapers
text: Designing and implementing functionalities for high-traffic systems to ensure efficient performance and scalability, improving performance, and delivering front-end functionalities for The Sun newspaper, and implementing key features of the serverless-based Times Public API.
